Shakespear - Hamlet</sm:Description> <sm:Category>Books</sm:Category> <sm:Price>28</sm:Price> <sm:Quantity>1</sm:Quantity> </sm:Item> <sm:Balance>53</sm:Balance> </sm:Invoice> </sm:SaleList> <sm:Trailer> <sm:CompletionTime>12:11:15-30.12.2014</sm:CompletionTime> </sm:Trailer> </sm:SaleMessage>
